name: 家有汉服 之 我想开个汉服店 \Home has Hanfu - I want to open a Hanfu shop
name_original: 家有汉服 之 我想开个汉服店 \Home has Hanfu - I want to open a Hanfu shop
description:
Game features:

puzzle game, survival

Learning the styles of Hanfu: in the game, players will recognize many styles of Hanfu and experience the process of making a Hanfu.

The taste of love: you can pursue male and female roles in the game. When you are moved to a certain extent, you can open the hand-in-hand mode to date, eat and play with your favorite roles.

Learning the styles of Hanfu: in the game, players will recognize many styles of Hanfu and experience the process of making a Hanfu.

Simple business: bid farewell to the complex business game, this game can let you experience the sense of achievement of opening a Hanfu shop.

Secret room scene: in reality, there may be a lot of taboos to escape from the secret room. However, in this game, you can safely and boldly explore without spending too much money.

Interesting Hanfu story: sad or happy Hanfu story, waiting for you to find.

Style of Q version: character, animation and scene design (some scenes are modified with free authorized materials, and characters and animation are completely original).

If you want to learn Hanfu style, this game is a good choice.

If you are single for too long and want to fall in love, no matter whether you choose a boy or a girl, you can enter the palace of Han marriage.

If you want to open a Hanfu shop, this game is undoubtedly your vanguard.

If you want to experience entrepreneurship, this game will undoubtedly bring you a unique experience.

I hope this game can become an opportunity for you to understand and like Hanfu.
